body.name: Crate 61, Handmade Vegan Natural Bar Soap Cold Pressed For Face And Body, With Premium Essential Oils, Eucalyptus & Peppermint For Men And Women 3 Pack (Lemongrass)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 22 hrs 6 mins
features: PREMIUM QUALITY: Traditional Cold Process Soap. Made by hand in Canada using 100% plant based and all natural ingredients. All natural aromas from premium essential oils and all natural colorants exclusively from minerals, clays and plant extracts.
CLEAN & HEALTHY SKIN: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Avocado Oil and Kaolin Clay leave your skin feeling nourished AND clean!

NEVER SYNTHETIC: Our proprietary scents and colors are achieved exclusively from Premium Essential Oils and 100% Natural Clays, Minerals and Plant Extracts. NO phthalates, NO parabens, NO sulfates, NO silicones, NO micas or oxides, NO dyes.
SUSTAINABLE AT OUR CORE: All ingredients are sourced sustainably and packaged in recycled kraft paperboard. Our products leave nothing but paper behind!
THOUGHTFUL GIFT: Crate 61 Hand Made Traditional Bar Soaps make for a great gift! Choose from 15 scents and counting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect. Used for years now.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect soap. Hiwecer, don’t use the exfoliating one on face or sensitive skin.The rest of them- Great lather, I use it for shaving lotion too! Cleans well and skin feels soft and hydrated after. I have sensitive skin and this stuff is great! Really like the scents too, they’re nice but not overpowering at all.I love the coconut one and the alpine spices. I recently got the mango one that has exfoliating stuff in it, and won’t be getting it again. It tore my skin up like I washed with broken glass. Smelled great, but took a week for my skin to recover. The other ones are fabulous for me though. I’ll use the exfoliating mango one on my legs before I shave, but not on any sensitive skin again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A staple in my home
reviews.reviewText: I love how these rinse without leaving residue or drying your skin out. The scent is mild and pleasant and each bar lasts a really long time. Worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to love it - 3.5 stars
reviews.reviewText: TL/DR: 3.5 stars. Great lather, fragrance disappears quickly. Much smaller than expected.I really wanted to love this soap. I love the company and what they stand for, and frankly it is good soap. It does a great job lathering up and cleaning, and doesn't contain any nasty stuff. It's good soap. I just wish the cedar and pine smell would have hung around a little longer. It starts off smelling great, But just ends up smelling soapy after a week or so of use. The smell definitely changes over time and loses a lot of its initial potency. In fact at the outset it's a little too strong, kind of overwhelming, makes your whole bathroom smell like this stuff. But when it mellows and the fragrance becomes less aggressive, it's different. It doesn't smell like a forest anymore. It's almost like synthetic pine air freshener. Also, these are really small. I was kind of surprised how small they are. Definitely not a shower soap--far too small. More of a hand soap for a soap dish by the sink. I'm going to try a different scent next time, perhaps that one will stick around. Also the sharp corners of a new bar make it difficult to hold on to, and if you try to use this in the shower it's going to fly everywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what my skin needed
reviews.reviewText: My skin is extremely sensitive and I'm allergic to many of the commonly used ingredients in soaps/body washes plus I'm vegan. With that said, it's hard for me to find a product that I like and that works well for me. I switched from another natural brand that worked ok but I was bored with to this one. I was really enticed by the scent combinations as the other brand was unscented. I loved it so much I just recently ordered it again in another scent! This soap lathers very nicely, is moisturizing and smells wonderful. I was expecting a creamsicle like scent, which isn't quite it, but it genuinely does smell of vanilla and citrus. Like a more clean/sophisticated scent without being too strong or overwhelming. I keep my soap bars just outside of the shower and they seemed to last pretty long. I average about a bar every two months. It seems to help prevent the itchy dry skin I normally struggle with every winter. I really have no complaints about these at all and will continue to use them :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All around great quality soap! Moisturizing and Deep Cleaning
reviews.reviewText: I was on the search to upgrade my bar soap as the one I would get at the local pharmacy just wasn't cutting it anymore. I bought this soap set while it was on sale and do not regret it. so much so that it prompted me to go to the company's website and buy their gift box set!Now, Im the type that showers twice a day so morning and night. I also use a washcloth and lather it once. 1 bar of soap within this set will last half a month with the frequency of daily showering will last me three weeks so that means the 3 bar set last 2 months and 3 weeks. Yup, I like to see what Im getting for my money so I had to do all of that math.With that said, it is so moisturizing and deep cleansing. I truly feel cleansed by the end of my shower especially in the pit area as I suffer from Hyperhidrosis under my arms so I use heavy deodorants as a result and this thing still manages to remove the build up and is so strong that it replaces it with the scent of the bar. Love it!Now for the scent, it is so FRAGRANT and to me that is a great thing! When I first opened the bar and placed in my shower it took up to 5 minutes for the whole bathroom to smell like it and 3 more minutes for the smell to reach my living room....MY GOODNESS! Even my maintenance people who came on my apartment made a comment on it and I giggled to myself, haha! So needless to say if you're one who likes to wear perfume, you may be able to skip it some days as this soap will be all the perfume you need if you want. The smell from the bar doesn't smell artificial either which I am pleased about.With the nature of how this soap is comprised, you will have to wash your shower more frequently to remove the build up. For me I have to wash my shower like 2 to 3 times a week but that's because I also use a body lotion that is natural as well so its just builds times 2 when it comes to shower time, sigh. But hey, the quality of the ingredients makes it all worth it for me. As nothing feels better than being able to step out of the shower feeling a deep sense of cleanliness..Affordable self-care.I will be sticking to this brand for some time and hope that they do not change the ingredient list. Its good as it is! Just maybe increase the bar size or lessen the degradation time of the bars so it can last longer?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This soap just isn’t what it used to be. Now the bars each have a few big air bubbles, so I’m probably getting less soap with each purchase. It was never a long lasting soap, so this is a bummer. The first time I noticed this the scent was off as well but since then the scent has been consistent. The bubbles are also consistently there. For the first time in years I’ll be looking for a new soap brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These soaps smells good and I feel fresh clean after using this soap while it’s mild for my sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality soap at a reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: Not only is this soap cheaper than most other natural/cold pressed soaps, it also has my favorite scents. The mint and pine are amazing
This soap is a great gift for someone, it was bigger than I had expected and the smell is great. It isn’t a strong smelling soap which I like.

This is the BEST natural soap you will ever get. Period. I have always had dry, sensitive skin and can’t stand artificial fragrances. Crate 61 is a proudly Canadian company based in Toronto. The scent variety is amazing. Keep in mind that since this is a natural soap, it may break down faster due to moisture. I place it on a soap bar stand. If you are looking for a natural soap, look no further. It’s awesome and MUCH cheaper than a certain competitor *cough* Mr. Squatch *cough*

I have really dry skin. Most instore products do not do anything for my skin. This one is great on my skin. Super gentle on my face. We've ordered a few of the Crate 61 Organics soaps. We love them all. This one is definitely one of our favorites. Scent is not over powering. It is the perfect amount. Hubby and I both love this one. He also loves the charcoal one. N I also love the peppermint one. All round great brand. Great products. Highly recommended. If unsure what scent to try get one of their mixed boxes with 6 different scents. You are sure to find one you like.
J’adore cette marque !! Je me lave qu’avec ceux-ci depuis 1 an et je ne m’en passe plus ! Super odeur j’adore !!

This is a great natural charcoal soap. It is basically unscented, so would not recommend for anyone looking for a scented soap.Overall, I'm satisfied with this product:- lathers richly and rinses well- mildly exfoliates without drying the skin- good for face and body- all natural ingredients- as long-lasting as any normal soap bar (assuming it is dried thoroughly after each use)
